TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypedDataSetGenerator extends System.Object

span.span: Generates a strongly typed class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供資訊 （例如，XML 結構描述），並且建立具類型資料集類別。The class takes information provided (for example, an XML schema) and creates a typed dataset class.

span.span: Generates a strongly typed class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生強型別 (Strongly Typed) 。Generates a strongly typed .

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 來源 ，指定型別 的中繼資料 (Metadata)。

span.span: The source that specifies the metadata for the typed .

param.name: codeNamespace
param.span: 為型別 提供目標命名空間的命名空間。

span.span: The namespace that provides the target namespace for the typed .

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: 特定語言的 ，用來產生資料集。

span.span: The language-specific to use to generate the dataset.

summary.span: 根據現有的 ，產生強型別 (Strongly Typed) 。

span.span: Generates a strongly typed based on an existing .
A strongly typed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生強型別 (Strongly Typed) 。Generates a strongly typed . 中所示的命名空間中建立資料集`codeNamespace`參數和資料集在 managed 程式語言中所示產生`codeProvider`參數。The dataset is created in the namespace indicated in the `codeNamespace` parameter, and the dataset is generated in the managed programming language indicated in the `codeProvider` parameter.
